mapper.select: SELECT title , maintext , regdate , address , phone , email , userid , username FROM coverletter WHERE userid = #{userid} and title = #{title}
SELECT title , regdate , userid FROM coverletter WHERE userid = #{userid} ORDER BY regdate

insert.foreach: INTO education( resume_no , school_name , degree_level , enter_date , graduate_date , major )VALUES( #{resume_no} , NVL(#{item.school_name},'') , NVL(#{item.degree_level},'') , #{item.enter_date} , #{item.graduate_date} , NVL(#{item.major},''))

INTO experience( resume_no , company_name , job_description , start_date , end_date )VALUES( #{resume_no} , NVL(#{item.company_name},'') , NVL(#{item.job_description},'') , #{item.start_date} , #{item.end_date})
INTO additional_info( resume_no , info_title , detail , remarks , info_date )VALUES( #{resume_no} , NVL(#{item.info_title},'') , NVL(#{item.detail},'') , NVL(#{item.remarks},'') , #{item.info_date})

mapper.delete: {call declare begin delete from education where resume_no = #{resume_no}; delete from additional_info where resume_no = #{resume_no}; delete from experience where resume_no = #{resume_no}; end}

mapper.update: UPDATE resume SET title = #{title} , username = #{username} , phone = #{phone} , regdate = sysdate , deadline = to_timestamp(#{deadline}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') , address = #{address} WHERE resume_no =(SELECT resume_no FROM resume WHERE userid = #{userid} and title = #{title})
mapper.select: SELECT resume_no , title , regdate , deadline , userid FROM resume WHERE userid = #{userid} and title = #{title}
SELECT resume_no , title , regdate , deadline , userid FROM resume WHERE userid = #{userid} ORDER BY resume_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUME( resume_no , username , userid , title , regdate , deadline , phone , address )VALUES( resume_seq.NEXTVAL , #{username} , #{userid} , #{title} , sysdate , to_timestamp(#{deadline}, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') , #{phone} , #{address})
mapper.select: SELECT r.RESUME_NO , r.USERNAME , r.TITLE , r.ADDRESS , r.DEADLINE , r.PHONE , r.REGDATE , r.USERID , e.DEGREE_LEVEL , to_char(e.ENTER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') enter_date , to_char(e.GRADUATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') graduate_date , e.MAJOR, e.MAJOR, e.SCHOOL_NAME , p.COMPANY_NAME , to_char(p.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') end_date , p.JOB_DESCRIPTION , to_char(p.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') start_date , i.INFO_TITLE, i.DETAIL , to_char(i.INFO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') info_date , i.REMARKS FROM resume r join education e on r.resume_no = e.resume_no join experience p on r.resume_no = p.resume_no join additional_info i on r.resume_no = i.resume_no WHERE r.resume_no = #{resume_no}
